data.text: Eyi ne nhyira a Onyankopɔn nipa Mose de hyiraa Israelfo no ansa na ɔrewu:
Ose, “Awurade fi Sinai bae
Nokware ni, wo na wodɔ nnipa no,
mmara a Mose de maa yɛn no;
Ɔyɛɛ ɔhene wɔ Yeshurun
“Ma Ruben nya nkwa na onwu,
Na ɔkaa eyi faa Yuda ho:
Asɛm a ɔka faa Lewi abusuakuw ho:
Lewifo tiee wʼasɛm
Afei, ma wɔnkyerɛ Yakob wo mmara no.
Hyira Lewifo, Ao Awurade
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Benyamin abusuakuw ho:
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Yosef mmusuakuw ho:
Ɔmfa ne nnepa efi owia mu ba
ne nnɔbae pa a efi tete mmepɔw mu
ne akyɛde a ɛso nni a efi asase ne ne mayɛ mu,
Yosef sɛ nantwinini a ɔyɛ abakan wɔ ahenni mu.
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Sebulon ne Isakar mmusuakuw ho:
Wɔbɛfrɛ nnipa ahorow akɔ bepɔw no so
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Gad abusuakuw ho:
Gad nkurɔfo paw asase pa no maa wɔn ho;
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Dan abusuakuw ho:
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Naftali abusuakuw ho:
Asɛm a Mose ka faa Aser abusuakuw ho:
Wʼapon ho nkyerewa nyɛ dade ne kɔbere mfrafrae;
“Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ sɛ Yeshurun Nyankopɔn;
Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ hɔ daa yɛ wo guankɔbea;
Enti, Israel bɛtena ase dwoodwoo;
Nhyira nka mo, Israel!
